 2007-04552007-03-29CITIZENSHIP,  ,  ,  , 
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisReappointment of LOIS DELIA FIGG of Toronto, Ontario, to be a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Toronto Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years; and designation of LOIS DELIA FIGG to be Assistant Deputy Chairperson of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Toronto Regional Office); effective June 26, 2007.
